BerkOzzambak

My name is Berk Ozzambak. I am currently studying the second year of my bachelors degree on Software Engineering and working as a teaching assistant at CODE University of Applied Sciences, Berlin. My interest in technology and computers dates back to my childhood, to the day my father taught me how to run Prince of Persia on MS-DOS.

While being keen to explore the different branches of software development, I am currently focusing on web development technologies and improving my skills on full stack web development, using primarily JavaScript front and backend frameworks (Vue.js / Node.js). You can see and download my resume from this link.

Besides being interested in programming and technology, I am a semi-professional electric guitar player who is heavily influenced by the names like Jimi Hendrix, John Frusciante and Tom Morello (listen to my band's EP on Spotify ), father of two lovely dogs that are adopted from the street and a huge basketball fan. I follow a plant-based diet. I have also had English teaching experience from the time I have spent in Hangzhou, China and have a bachelors degree on International Relations.
